description: Class was present at compile time but not found at runtime. Differs from ClassNotFoundException - indicates class loading failure.
commonCauses: ProGuard removed class but not references
Dependency not included in final APK
solutions: Enable multidex for apps exceeding 64K methods
Check for exceptions in static initializers
Add ProGuard keep rules for missing classes
Verify dependencies are packaged in APK
Increase heap size if OOM during init
prevention: Enable multidex on projects with many dependencies
Monitor APK size and method count
Test class loading on low-memory devices
examples: class App : MultiDexApplication() { override fun attachBaseContext(base: Context) { super.attachBaseContext(base); MultiDex.install(this) } }
